fields.name: We built Palatial for 3D artists and designers (including aspiring ones).
fields.value:
Specifically designed to handle a variety of 3D scenes, Palatial can extend the use of existing models used for visualization or design by turning them into shareable interactive spatial environments.

Like a universal adapter, Palatial can be used in a variety of ways - we recently saw a user use the tool to prepare a Cinema4D model for Fortnite!
